# \<shibui-dropdown-menu\>

Simple, modern, and inspired dropdown menu.

<!---

-->
```html
<shibui-dropdown-menu>
  <button slot="trigger">Trigger</button>
  <a>Account Settings</a>
  <a>Notifications</a>
  <a>Sign out</a>
</shibui-dropdown-menu>
```
